version_description:
You can now add new beneficiaries instantly, directly from the app (with your Mobile Secure Key activated)!

We’ve made it easy for you to switch to this new app! You can transfer all your settings stored in the previous app in just a few quick steps. Follow the instructions.

We’ve also fixed a few minor bugs and made some enhancements.

We’re constantly listening to your feedback! Please let us know what you think in the comments.

- Improved compatibility with iOS 9.
- Fixed the display problem on the registration path of a Secure Key Mobile.

Send us your feedback !

- Find HSBC contact details in the “Contact Us” section.
- The 2nd line of the address is no longer mandatory when adding a new beneficiary.
- Fixed the image for MasterCard Gold card.

Send us your feedback !

Improved the "request timed out" handling at logon.

Send us your feedback!

- Increased server request duration to reduce timeout issue
- It has been noticed that timeout could occur when using VPN. If that’s your case, please disable it before trying to login

Send us your feedback!

- Bug fixes and minor enhancements

Send us your feedback!

New customers can now register for Mobile and Online Banking directly from the app.
Send us your feedback!

• You can now reinstall Secure Key on your new smartphone simpler and faster! Just logon without Secure Key and follow the steps.

• Cheque book ordering is available (from the "More" menu and then "Cheques").

• Global Transfers : move money to your HSBC international accounts (access through the "Move Money" menu).

Send us your feedback!

• You can now reinstall Secure Key on your new smartphone simpler and faster! Just logon without or with Secure Key and follow the steps.

• Cheque book ordering is available (from the "More" menu and then "Cheques").

• Global Transfers : move money to your HSBC international accounts (access through the "Move Money" menu).

Send us your feedback!

Bug fixes and minor enhancements.

Send us your feedback!

• View the details of your life insurance wrapper (from the Home screen, select a life insurance wrapper).
• You can now reset your memorable answer or your password directly from the mobile
• Fixed the white screen issue when opening the app on some devices (conflict with the "power saving" mode).
• Fixed the issue when sending a Global Transfer over 1000.

We wish you a happy new year!

Send us your feedback!

• Apple Pay finally available (add an eligible card from the card details screen),
• Bug fixes and minor enhancements.
Send us your feedback!

- You can now download your RIB/IBAN in PDF format (useful for your direct debit operations),

- And also bug fixes and minor enhancements.

Send us your feedback!

Bug fixes and minor enhancements.

Send us your feedback!

You can now book and manage your appointments directly within the app!

Bug fixes and minor enhancements.

Send us your feedback!

New: You can now set recurring transfers for your local payees.
Furthermore, we have designed a new experience to make all your transfers to make it easier to use and more fluid.
We have also corrected a few bugs and added minor enhancements.
Send us your feedback!

Bug fixes and minor enhancements.

Send us your feedback!

Recommend us to your friends and family. Your friends and family will receive a warm welcome
We have also corrected a few bugs and added minor enhancements. Send us your feedback!

## Useful

You can now view attachments directly in your secure messages inbox !

You'll also soon be able to add attachements when you'll send us messages (we're working on it).

## Simpler

You can now add new beneficiaries and validate with Face ID or Touch ID instead of your Secure Key password!

You'll also easily generate one time passkeys to access your accounts on hsbc.fr.

We have also corrected a few bugs and added minor enhancements.


As usual, send us your feedback. We read all of them.

• With this new version, you can now send us attachments, documents, photos when you send us messages.
• We have also fixed a few bugs and added minor enhancements.
• As usual, please send us your feedback. We read all of them!

With this new version, you can now send us attachments, documents, photos when you send us messages.

We have also fixed a few bugs and added minor enhancements.

As usual, please send us your feedback. We read all of them!

Thanks to this new version, find a branch easily and access its opening hours and contact information from the "Contact us" menu.
In accordance with the CBPR2 regulations, you will benefit from a better transparency regarding possible conversion charges and fees for SEPA and international transfers.
We have also fixed a few bugs and added minor enhancements.
As usual, please send us your feedback.

Your statements and documents are now available directly in the app!
The RIB/IBAN have moved in this new section: Statements and documents.

We have also fixed a few bugs and added minor enhancements.

As usual, please send us your feedback. We read all of them!

Want to send a secure message, book an appointment, find the nearest branch or simply call us?

It is all now available in the new "Contact" section.

We have also fixed a few bugs and added minor enhancements.

Keep sending us your feedback. We read all of them!
